Articles.Content:
Is there a way to show the notes section (under vessel name) outside of the VAB? I use mine to keep a record of what each action group does but after hopping back and forth between multiple ships, I tend to forget and this often results in me decoupling something instead of opening the solar panels.

Edited September 8, 2013 by djnattyd

Ahh, that's a shame.

Mods, go ahead and close this
B9 aerospace has an info module that does precisely this.

B9 aerospace has an info module that does precisely this.

Thanks for that Traches, had B9 sat uninstalled as well. Got a reason to install it now
If you don't want B9, Firespitter has an almost identical part.

If you don't want B9, Firespitter has an almost identical part.

I've had B9 sat in a zip for a while, just never got around to adding it as I'm not a big space plane builder

You can dig through B9 and just pull out the info recorder if that's all you're going to use.

Kerbal Space Program\GameData\B9_Aerospace\Parts\Utility_InfoDrive
